title: The Lost Art of Gratitude
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: She would take him down to the canal, she said, to look at the boats. And then there was her friend who lived in Harrison Gardens and who always welcomed a visit from Charlie. After that he could have his sleep.

title: The Lost Art of Gratitude
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: She chose to walk down to the bridge at Harrison Gardens
